page.title: 05Todwick - Proposed Airport
page.content: Over the last few months there has been talk about a new{airport}in {South Yorkshire. A survey from{SYCC}shows that in between{109}to{155}two-way business trips could use the airport every day. After two years there would be between{30,000}to{50,000}people passing through the gates. The {airport}would provide a regular scheduled passenger service to{ {Britain's major international {airports}and to short distance destinatations. A site has not been chosen but one suggestion is at {Hardwick}west of Long Road. When it is built the airport would have a runway of about{1000m.
